info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 4 at 10:22PM EDT until April 10 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Northern Indiana
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Ohio...Michigan...
Wabash River near Linn Grove affecting Adams and Wells Counties.
Auglaize River near Fort Jennings affecting Putnam, Allen OH and Paulding Counties.
Blanchard River at Ottawa affecting Putnam County.
Maumee River near Defiance affecting Henry and Defiance Counties.
Maumee River at Fort Wayne affecting Paulding and Allen IN Counties.
Saint Joseph River Ohio near St. Joe River Ft. Wayne affecting Allen IN County.
Saint Marys River near Decatur affecting Adams, Van Wert and Allen IN Counties.
Saint Joseph River Michigan at South Bend affecting Berrien, St. Joseph and Elkhart Counties.
North Branch Elkhart River at Cosperville affecting Noble County.
Saint Joseph River Ohio near Newville affecting Defiance, De Kalb and Allen IN Counties.
Tiffin River at Stryker affecting Williams, Fulton OH and Defiance Counties.
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio...
Maumee River at Napoleon affecting Henry County.
Saint Joseph River Ohio below Montpelier affecting Williams County.
...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Indiana...
Elkhart River at Goshen affecting Elkhart and Noble Counties.
For the Wabash River...including Linn Grove, Bluffton IN, Wabash, Logansport...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Auglaize River...including Fort Jennings, Defiance...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Blanchard River...including Ottawa...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Maumee River...including Fort Wayne, Defiance, Napoleon... Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Saint Joseph River Ohio...including Montpelier, Newville, St. Joe River Ft. Wayne...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Saint Marys River...including Decatur, St. Mary's River near Fort Wayne...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Tiffin River...including Stryker...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Elkhart River...including Goshen, Cosperville...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Saint Joseph River Ohio below Montpelier.
* WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, County Road K, one mile southwest of Montpelier is flooded. Flood waters affect the southeast side of Pioneer and cover large areas of low land and agricultural land near the river.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM EDT Friday the stage was 13.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:00 PM EDT Friday was 13.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.7 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes.
The next statement will be issued this evening at 1130 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON
